name: Check Suit Blazer
decription: Blazer with a notched lapel collar. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Chest welt pocket and flap hip pocket. Inside pocket detail. Back vents at the hem. Front button fastening.

name: Houndstooth Suit Blazer
decription: Blazer with a notched lapel collar and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Flap pockets at the hip and inside pocket detail. Back vents. Front button fastening.

name: Tuxtured Suit Blazer
decription: Regular-fit blazer. Notched lapel collar and long sleeves and buttoned cuffs. Chest welt pocket with flap hip pockets. Inside pocket detail. Back vents. Buttoned front

name: Linen Suit Blazer
decription: Blazer with a notched lapel collar. Long sleeves with button details on the cuffs. Chest welt pocket and hip flap pockets. Inside pocket detail. Front button fastening.

name: Suit Blazer
decription: Blazer with notched lapel collar and long sleeves. Hip patch pockets. Double-breasted buttoned front.

name: Oxford Shirt
decription: Regular fit shirt. Button-down collar and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Chest patch pocket. Button-up front.

name: Oversized Shirt With Pocket
decription: Slim-fit spread collar shirt made of cotton. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a button-up front.

name: Poplin Shirt
decription: Oversize shirt featuring a spread collar and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Asymmetric hem with side slits. Button-up front.

name: Mesh Tuxtured Shirt
decription: Relaxed fit shirt made of openwork fabric. Camp collar and short sleeves. Chest patch pockets. Button-up front

name: Cotton-Linen Shirt
decription: Relaxed fit shirt made of a linen blend. Featuring a button-down collar, long sleeves with inside tabs and a button-up front.

name: Floral Print T-Shirt
decription: T-shirt with a round neckline and short sleeves. Featuring a contrast print on the front.

name: Slogan Print T-Shirt
decription: T-shirt with a round neckline and short sleeves. Contrast graphic prints on the front and back.

name: Patch T-shirt
decription: Round neck T-shirt with short sleeves. Contrast patch appliqué on the back.

name: Textured Ottoman T-Shirt
decription: Round neck T-shirt with short sleeves. Contrast prints on the front, back and sleeve.

name: Premium T-Shirt With Pocket
decription: T-shirt with a round neckline, short sleeves and chest patch pocket.

name: Ripped Skinny Jean
decription: Faded skinny fit jeans. Five-pocket design. Ripped details on the legs. Front zip fly and top button fastening.

name: Straight Fit Jean
decription: Straight fit jeans with five pockets. Faded effect. Front button fastening.

name: Abstract Print Jean
decription: Slim fit jeans with a five-pocket design, a zip fly and top button fastening.

name: The 90S Slim Fit Jean
decription: Slim fit jeans. Five pockets. Faded effect. Turn-up hems. Front button fastening.

name: Baggy Fit Jean
decription: Baggy fit jeans. Five pockets. Faded effect. Front zip fly and button fastening.

name: Denim Bermuda Short
decription: Regular fit faded Bermuda shorts with a five pocket design and zip fly and top button fastening.

name: Jogger Bermuda Short
decription: Bermuda shorts featuring an elastic waistband with adjustable drawstring. Front pockets and rear patch pocket detail.

name: Trainning Short
decription: Running shorts made of lightweight, stretchy technical fabric. Designed for running or use in functional training.

name: Running Short
decription: Running shorts made of lightweight, stretchy technical fabric. Designed for running or use in functional training.

name: Basic Bermuda Short
decription: Regular fit faded Bermuda shorts with a five pocket design and zip fly and top button fastening.

name: Faux Leather Biker Jacket
decription: Jacket featuring a lapel collar with snap-button details. Tabs on the shoulders. Long sleeves with zipped cuffs. Pockets with zip fastening on the chest and hip. Inside pocket. Inner pocket detail. Front asymmetric fastening with metal zip.

name: Basic Bomber Jacket
decription: Jacket with a ribbed collar and long sleeves. Hip welt pockets and an inside pocket detail. Elastic hem. Zip-up front.

name: Basic Denim Jacket
decription: Collared jacket featuring long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Chest flap pockets and hip welt pockets. Faded effect. Button-up front

name: Contrast Corduroy Overshirt
decription: Relaxed fit overshirt with a matching fabric collar. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Chest and hip patch pockets. Button-up front.

name: Lightweight Puffer Jacket
decription: Jacket with a high neck. Hip welt pockets and a zip-up front

name: Oversized Blazer
decription: Cropped blazer with a lapel collar and long sleeves with shoulder pads. Featuring metallic thread and sequin appliqués, false flap pockets and golden button fastening at the front.

name: Textured Blazer
decription: Open blazer made of a linen blend. Featuring a lapel collar, long turn-up sleeves with printed fabric, shoulder pads and front flap pockets

name: Linen Blend Cropped Blazer
decription: Loose-fitting blazer featuring a lapel collar, long sleeves with pronounced shoulders, front flap pockets and front double-breasted button fastening.

name: Double-Breasted Linen Blazer
decription: Blazer with a lapel collar and long sleeves. Front flap pockets. Double-breasted button fastening.

name: Textured Checked Blazer
decription: Blazer featuring a lapel collar and long sleeves with shoulder pads. Featuring front pockets with flaps and double-breasted front fastening with textured metal buttons.

name: Long Dress
decription: Collared dress featuring short sleeves, front patch pockets with flaps, a matching belt with buckle and front golden button fastening.

name: Printed Ruffle Dress
decription: Midi dress made of 100% lightweight cotton. Featuring a slot collar with buttons, short sleeves, side in-seam pockets and a panelled hem.

name: Dot Long Dress
decription: Midi dress made of 100% lightweight cotton with a sweetheart neckline. Exposed shoulders and puffy sleeves. Side in-seam pockets. Zip fastening at the back

name: Lace-up Shift Dress Suede
decription: Midi dress with a straight neckline and ruffled elastic trim. Wide straps with seashell appliqués.

name: Traditional India Dress
decription: Round neck dress with short sleeves. Featuring false flap pockets with metal buttons on the front

name: Vintage Shirt
decription: Collared shirt made of a linen blend. Long sleeves. False flaps on the front. Button-up front.

name: Check Shirt
decription: Shirt made of a cotton blend. Johnny collar and long sleeves with contrast stripes. Asymmetric hem. Button-up front.

name: Striped Shirt
decription: Collared shirt with long sleeves. Front patch pocket. Asymmetric hem. Button-up front.

name: Heywood Flannel Shirt
decription: Collared shirt with sleeves falling below the elbow. Fastens at the front with buttons hidden by a placket.

name: Long-Sleeved Shirt
decription: Shirt made of 100% linen with long sleeves. Featuring an asymmetric hem with side vents and a button-up front.

name: Light Pink T-Shirt
decription: Round neck T-shirt with short sleeves. Rhinestone detail on the shoulder

name: T-Shirt with Shimmery Slogan
decription: Round neck T-shirt with short sleeves. Raised embroidery and printed detail.

name: Graphic Tees T-Shirt
decription: T-shirt with a round neckline and short sleeves. Contrast front girl print detail.

name: Basic T-Shirt
decription: Round neck T-shirt with short sleeves.

name: Cotton T-Shirt
decription: Short sleeve T-shirt with a round neck and contrast slogan detail on the front.

name: Ripped Mom Jean
decription: High-waist rigid jeans. Five-pocket design. Ripped details with a front zip fly and metal button fastening.

name: High-Rise Straight Jean
decription: High-waist jeans with a five-pocket design. Front zip fly and metal top button fastening.

name: Mid Rise Flare Jean
decription: Mid-rise jeans made of slightly stretchy fabric. Featuring flared hems with a seamless finish. Zip fly and metal top button fastening at the front.

name: Cropped Flare Jean
decription: Faded high-waist jeans with five pockets. Flared seamless hems. Front zip fly and button fastening.

name: Flared Full Length Jean
decription: High-rise faded jeans with five pockets. Faded effect. Seamless hems. Front button fastening.

name: Mini Skirt With Tie Detail
decription: High-waist mini skirt. Draped fabric on the side. V-shaped hem. Invisible side zip fastening.

name: Draped Mini Skirt
decription: High-waist mini skirt. Draped fabric on the side. V-shaped hem. Invisible side zip fastening.

name: Skort with Knot Detail
decription: High-waist skort with a matching bow. Ruffled hem. Invisible side zip fastening.

name: High Waisted Short
decription: High-waist short with a front knot and invisible back zip fastening.

name: Retro Bermuda Short
decription: High-rise Bermuda shorts in rigid fabric with five pockets. Zip fly and metal button fastening.
